name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Perfect Meat Temp: Steak & Meat Doneness Guide

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steak and meat temperature guide for well done, medium rare, and more. Covers chicken, prime rib, and doneness temperatures.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Perfect Meat Temp is the ultimate guide for cooking steak and other meats to perfection. Get precise temperatures for well-done, medium-rare, and rare doneness levels. Covers a variety of meats like steak, chicken, pork, lamb, and fish, with cooking times and safe internal temperatures. Convert between Fahrenheit and Celsius with ease, and enjoy temperature charts for grilling, roasting, sous vide, and more.
